attributes.action: Elect President Trump to the House of Lords
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be made a Lord for his constant perseverance in the face of lies and false accusations from the media. His commitment to supporting the UK after Brexit should not go unnoticed and unrewarded in the UK. Make him a lord!

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments.

Anyone can nominate someone for non-party political membership of the House of Lords. You can find out more here:

http://lordsappointments.independent.gov.uk/how-to-apply.aspx

If you want the House of Lords to be elected, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/218019
